records.label: Transformation as a Service
records.desc: Providing dynamic, flexible transformation (or normalization) of data, and facilitating communication of transformed data across systems. In exemplary embodiments, a transformation platform may be implemented to provide "transformation as a service."

records.label: Routing Optimization Based On Historical Network Measures
records.desc: The present disclosure relates generally to network communications, and relates more particularly to devices, computer-readable media, and methods for optimizing the routing of communications through networks based on historical network measures.

records.label: Extending Legacy Scripting Languages with Graphical References
records.desc: A graphical data type inference transparently transforms a legacy text-oriented command line interface (CLI) into a graphic-oriented or graphic-aware CLI (G-CLI).
